author: guitargeek
body:
Getting the Fall17 V2 Photon IDs into 10_2_X as requested by @peruzzim for NanoAOD by backporting several commits.

* Some work was already done during the 10_3_X cycle (weight files, better configuration...), so #24131 will also be backported here for consistent weight file paths and config files
* There is the commit from #24937 to fix a typo
* Cherry-pick of @slava77's commit to speed up the PhotonIDValueMapProducer from #25092
* Backport of the actual Photon IDs as in #25293
* Backport of the completed PhotonMVANtuplizer with matching and variable dumping from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25218

@Sam-Harper, @lsoffi, @michelif, @swagata87  FYI.

__Has to be tested with__ https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4518
title: [10_2_X] Egamma Fall17 V2 Photon IDs (original attempt)
